description: This file defines an abstract base class 'BaseMapper' for mapping between entity objects and Data Transfer Objects (DTOs). It provides generic conversion methods for collections, facilitating the transformation between entity and DTO instances.

classes.name: BaseMapper
classes.description: An abstract generic class providing conversion methods between entities (E) and DTOs (D), including collection conversions.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Abstract method to convert a DTO to an entity, with varargs for additional parameters.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Abstract method to convert an entity to a DTO, with varargs for additional parameters.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs to a collection of entities.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities to a collection of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntityList
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs to a list of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoList
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities to a list of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntitySet
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs to a set of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoSet
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities to a set of DTOs.
